episodes.overview: Tony and Elizabeth mount a search for the missing Carolyn. Adam hides Carolyn in a cellar while he attempts to reason with her. Willie goes through the dream ordeal, seeing a vision of a wolf.

episodes.name: DS-503
episodes.overview: Julia enters the Old House and finds Willie, seemingly in a trance-like state. She goes to him, and he says he was afraid it would be Carolyn. Julia finds that Willie has had the dream. Julia tells Willie that if the dream curse isn't stopped, someone will die--Barnabas. Willie tells Julia the dream, and he acts as if he's crazy. Julia offers to erase his memory of the dream, which he gladly accepts. While hypnotizing him, Willie says he sees a vision of Carolyn--underground! Julia is starteled by this, but continues to erase the memory of the dream. In the root cellar, Carolyn tells Adam to take her away. He does not understand. While his back is turned, she picks up a rock and is about to hit him with it, but he prevents her from doing so. Meanwhile, Julia finds that the memory of the dream will not go away. The dream is to ingrained into Willie's subconscious. Julia asks him about what he said about Carolyn, but he does not remember. He fears that Carolyn may be dead. Meanwhile, Car

episodes.name: DS-504
episodes.overview: In the root cellar, Carolyn wakes up. She tries to get out but can not due to the rock. At Collinwood, Elizabeth and Vickie sit in the drawing room. Elizabeth says she thinks Carolyn is dead--or soon will be. The phone rings, and Elizabeth hurries to answer it. Elizabeth tells Vickie that the person on the phone was the sheriff--Adam has been caught. Elizabeth decides to go to town to question Adam, and Vickie volunteers to go with her. Carolyn muses over things, and decides Adam must've left to get food since that was the only word she said that he fully understood. Meanwhile, at the jail, Adam sits in his cell, frustrated. Vickie and Elizabeth enter with the sheriff's deputy. The deputy makes fun of Adam, and Elizabeth tells him to stay out of Adam's sight. Elizabeth tries to question Adam, but he can not speak. Elizabeth decides they can not get anything from him, and starts to live. Adam moans, and Vickie notes that it seems like he wants to help them. Carolyn starts going crazy in

episodes.name: DS-505
episodes.overview: Adam runs through the woods, trying to escape from the sheriff's men. Sheriff Patterson goes to the Old House to ask Barnabas questions. He asks why he isn't looking for Carolyn. Barnabas says that he thought he would get the information from the Adam. Sheriff Patterson says he didn't. He tells Barnabas that Adam has escaped. Barnabas is surprised by this. Adam comes to the root cellar where he had locked Carolyn and opens it. Carolyn tries to escape, but Adam pulls on her hair. She tells him that he's hurting her, but Adam just mimics the word 'hurting'.  She says that she wants to go 'home', and Adam mimics her again. She starts screaming at him. Adam covers her mouth and takes her back into the root cellar. Carolyn cries, and Adam cries with her while playing with her hair. Adam takes Carolyn out of the cellar and carries her off.  Meanwhile, at the Old House, Sheriff Patterson continues to question Barnabas. He says that Adam had been shot by Roger earlier, but when he was seen aga

episodes.name: DS-506
episodes.overview: Barnabas and Willie search the bottem of Widow's Hill. Barnabas thinks Adam may still be alive, and if so he has to find him. Willie tells him that Adam has to be dead, and that his body must've been cast out to sea by the waves. Barnabas tells him to continue to search anyway. Willie says he wants to go to Collinwood to see Carolyn and tell her the dream. Barnabas tells him he can not go to Collinwood so the Dream Curse will not come to him. He then orders Willie to go, and Willie gives Barnabas a look of pure hatred. At Collinwood, Carolyn brushes her hair while some food lays by her. Elizabeth enters. Carolyn assures her that she is not afraid. Elizabeth tells her that the police say Adam is dead. She then asks if Adam hurt her. Carolyn tells her that he tried to be nice towards her in clumsy way...like a child. Carolyn says she'll sleep, and Elizabeth exits. Willie enters through the window. Carolyn is sleeping, and is awakened by him. She starts screaming, but he covers her mouth.

episodes.name: DS-507
episodes.overview: Carolyn starts the dream. She hears a knock on the door but doesn't answer it. She wakes up, and says she will not have the dream. At the Old House, Julia meets with Professor Stokes. Professor takes out a picture of a portrait of Josette duPres, and asks who it is. After finding out, he said it looks like Maggie Evans, and that is why Angelique would start with her. Stokes sends for Carolyn. When Carolyn arrives, they have Willie tell her the dream, even though she does not want to. Stokes puts her into a trance, which makes Carolyn have Stokes be the beckoner in her dream. She falls to sleep, and dreams the dream. At the end of the dream, she sees her own gravestone, screams, and wakes up. Carolyn then tells Stokes the dream. Stokes lays down to sleep on the couch and falls asleep...

episodes.name: DS-508
episodes.overview: Professor Stokes has the dream. In the dream, he refuses to open the door for the beckoner unless he speaks. The beckoner (Sam Evans) speaks. Professor Stokes tells him he will go by himself, but Sam says he'll die if he does. Professor Stokes goes to the door himself, and Sam Evans follows him. Professor Stokes recites the 'pitiful riddle' and then refuses to open the doors. Angelique appears. Angelique thinks it's Ben Stokes, but he tells her he is Timothy Stokes and not as ignorant as Ben. She threatens to make him as ignorant as Ben. She says he will die, and he says he knows he will---in a bed, of natural causes. Timothy calls her Cassandra, figuring that the witch really is Cassandra. Angelique then disappears and Timothy wakes up. Timothy tells Julia that the dream has been stopped for now. There is a knock at the door. Julia and Timothy answer the door. Joe Haskell & Sam Evans are at the door. Joe tells them that Sam felt he had to come here. Professor Stokes tells Sam that he

episodes.name: DS-509
episodes.overview: Adam drops the knife. Sam asks him what his name is, and Adam responds saying his name is 'Adam'. Sam gets some water from the kitchen to help Adam and clean his wounds, which had gotten from his fall off Widow's Hill. Professor Timothy Stokes enters, and Adam runs off into the night. Sam asks Stokes to stop him from leaving, but Stokes doesn't. Stokes says he seems like the man who jumped off Widow's Hill. Sam says no one could've survived that fall. Stokes tells Sam that if he has a dream in which he answers the door and sees Barnabas Collins, he should call Stokes immediatly. At Tony Peterson's office, Cassandra and Tony talk. Tony tells Cassandra that he does not like her and wishs she would stay at home with her husband Roger. Tony takes out a lighter, which Cassandra uses to hypnotize him. Cassandra sends Tony to Professor Stokes' house to poision him. At Stokes' house, Vickie visits him. She says the portrait of Angelique has been missing for over a week. Stokes talks with Vicki

episodes.name: DS-510
episodes.overview: Stokes calls Collinwood and is relieved that Julia answers. Julia comes to Stokes house and is able to treat Tony. She says it is strange of Tony to have done that. Stokes figures out that Tony is being used by Cassandra. He says they might need the help of the witch hunter who had sentenced Vickie--Reverand Trask! He takes out Ben Stokes' journal and tries to figure out where Trask is buried. Ben Stokes' leads Timothy's hands to fill in the blanks, and Timothy finds that Trask was bricked up in the Old House basement. Tony wakes up and enters. Timothy tells Tony to tell Cassandra that he is dead. At Collinwood in the foyer, Roger and Cassandra are playing chess. They get in an argument and Roger goes upstairs.Tony arrives and tells Cassandra that Timothy is dead. Roger sees them, and Tony pretends like he has come to Collinwood to see if Carolyn is awake. In the basement of the Old House, Professor Stokes, Tony, and Julia try ot contact the ghost of Reverand Trask. Trask talks through

episodes.name: DS-511
episodes.overview: The bricks move completely out, exposing the top half of the skeleton of Reverand Trask. Julia is shocked that the first Barnabas would have done this to anyone. Timothy Stokes calls to the ghost of Trask, but is not successful. Julia and Timothy wonder if Reverand Trask is inside Tony's body, and Tony refuses to acknowledge the possiblity. They hear music coming from upstairs, and Julia exclaims ""Adam!"". Timothy and Julia go upstairs and find that David is playing with a tape recorder. They ask him to leave and not tell his mother that he saw Professor Stokes. David leaves. Professor Stokes asks Julia why she said 'Adam!' At that moment, Tony screams for help. Julia and Timothy go back downstairs, and find that the skeleton of Reverand Trask has disappeared. Tony tells them he closed his eyes for a moment and when he opened them the skeleton was gone. Tony & Julia leave the house. Professor Stokes sighs in dismay because Trask would not appear to him, and Trask also sighs. At Collinwo

episodes.name: DS-512
episodes.overview: Trask gloats to Barnabas that he will decide Barnabas' fate. At the Evans cottage, Sam is bandaging Adam and asks him questions about his jump off Widow's Hill. Sam starts teaching Adam sentences, sentence fragments, and words. Adam starts rubbing his wrists, sensing that Barnabas is in danger. Sam tries to help Adam, but Adam just continues to say 'Barnabas...hurt'. Joe Haskell walks in, and frightens Adam. Adam out of the cottage, scared. Sam tells Joe that he has been helping Adam these last few days. Joe tells him Adam might be the man who kidnapped Carolyn a few days ago. Sam tells Joe that Adam IS the man who kidnapped Carolyn. Joe asks why Sam didn't call the police, Sam says that Adam saved Carolyn's life on Widow's Hill. Sam tells Joe about how Adam was saying 'Barnabas hurt'. Joe thinks Adam was trying to say 'hurt Barnabas', so he leaves to go to the Old House. When Joe arrives at the Old House, he finds that no one is home. In the basement of the Old House, Barnabas is call

episodes.name: DS-513
episodes.overview: When Elizabeth watches Cassandra and Tony meet, she decides to tell Roger. Cassandra retaliates by cursing her with preoccupations of impending death, leaving Elizabeth convinced that she will soon die.

episodes.name: DS-514
episodes.overview: Wearing Josette's earrings, Maggie is compelled to pay Willie a visit at the Old House, causing a rift with Joe. Maggie later has a frightening brush with Adam at the cottage. Elizabeth's morbid mood worsens.

episodes.name: DS-515
episodes.overview: Maggie and Willie find themselves at the mercy of a crazed Adam. When Sam attempts to intervene, he suffers severe injuries. An encounter with Josette's sobbing ghost leads Julia to Barnabas' tomb.

episodes.name: DS-516
episodes.overview: Julia and Willie manage to free Barnabas from his entombment. Elizabeth finds herself believing she is Naomi, as she sees visions of her future grave. The vengeful ghost of Trask turns his attentions to Cassandra.

episodes.name: DS-517
episodes.overview: Cassandra's powers prove a match for those of Trask. Learning that Sam's injuries are severe, Cassandra visits the hospital and works to makes him confide in Victoria, to ensure that the dream continues.

episodes.name: DS-518
episodes.overview: The arrival of Stokes interrupts Sam before he can pass on the dream. Sam's condition worsens and he dies without telling the dream to Victoria. Stokes tracks down Adam and attempts to connect with him.

episodes.name: DS-519
episodes.overview: Elizabeth's preoccupation with death continues, as she makes plans for her funeral. Meanwhile, the spirit of Reverend Trask captures Cassandra and exorcises her, making her disappear.

episodes.name: DS-520
episodes.overview: Trask's remains have returned to the Old House. Cassandra's spell makes Elizabeth re-enact Naomi's death from poison. Barnabas and Julia discover the prone Elizabeth... but have they reached her in time?

episodes.name: DS-521
episodes.overview: Barnabas and Julia try to find out what happened to Cassandra. To be sure that she's gone, they decide to check her portrait and see if her image is still there.  Professor Stokes secretly continues to help Adam and teaches him to speak.  Barnabas and Julia meet Roger and ask him to show them the portrait. Roger finds that the picture of Angelique has faded.  A gloved hand is suddenly seen knocking on the front door. Barnabas opens it and sees a well dressed gentleman. He tells Barnabas that he must be Cassandra's husband. Barnabas says no just as Roger shows up. He greets Roger and introduces himself as Nicholas Blair, Cassandra's brother.

episodes.name: DS-522
episodes.overview: Nicholas is concerned to learn that Cassandra is missing and takes the portrait of Angélique to learn where she is. Joe demands answers about Adam from Willie. Nicholas investigates recent events at Collinwood.

episodes.name: DS-523
episodes.overview: Nicholas summons the spirit of Trask to aid his search for Cassandra. He later uses his power to extract information about her from Tony. Jeff returns, and an encounter with Trask seems to signal a breakthrough.

episodes.name: DS-524
episodes.overview: Jeff remains in denial that he is the reincarnation of Peter Bradford. He later has a dream about 1795, where he tries to murder Nathan Forbes. Compelled to re-enact the past, Jeff launches himself on Joe.

episodes.name: DS-525
episodes.overview: Ghosts of the past make Jeff suspect that he is the reincarnation of Pater Bradford. Using Victoria to find the tree where Trask originally exorcised Cassandra, Nicholas sets about saving her.

episodes.name: DS-526
episodes.overview: Nicholas saves Cassandra, but warns her of the price any future failure will bring. After she discovers him sleepwalking, a troubled Jeff tells Victoria that he believes he is Peter Bradford.

episodes.name: DS-527
episodes.overview: Stokes uses hypnotism to learn about Jeff's past and is surprised to discover the truth about Adam's creation in the process. Stokes warns Victoria to leave Collinwood or face the dream.

episodes.name: DS-528
episodes.overview: Victoria stays with Maggie as she tries to escape the dream. Nicholas' impatience with Cassandra grows. Angélique appears to Victoria, attempting to begin the dream, witnessed by a terrified Maggie.

episodes.name: DS-529
episodes.overview: Victoria turns to Stokes for advice as she attempts to avoid the dream. Joe grows concerned that Stokes may be harbouring Adam. Armed with a gun, he investigates and pursues the fugitive.

episodes.name: DS-530
episodes.overview: Victoria considers fleeing from Collinsport, but is unable to leave Jeff. Cassandra summons Sam's spirit to pass the dream to Victoria. Joe is attacked by Adam, who leaves him injured in the Old House.

episodes.name: DS-531
episodes.overview: Julia finds Joe. He is very weak but still alive, and is taken to hospital. Victoria suffers the dream, led by Barnabas, which now concludes with him lying injured with a wounded throat.

episodes.name: DS-532/533
episodes.overview: Barnabas fruitlessly offers to marry Cassandra if she will stop the dream. Nicholas meets Maggie and is infatuated. Victoria decides to keep away from Barnabas to stop the dream reaching him.

episodes.name: DS-534
episodes.overview: Julia intervenes after a ruse from Cassandra forces a meeting between Barnabas and Victoria. Victoria struggles to cope with the effects of the dream. Carolyn tracks down Adam and offers him help.

episodes.name: DS-535
episodes.overview: Barnabas implores Victoria to tell him the dream to spare her further suffering, and she reluctantly confides it. Barnabas undergoes the dream ordeal and survives, only to be attacked by a bat.

episodes.name: DS-536
episodes.overview: As Barnabas lies dead, Julia is unable to stake him to prevent him rising as a vampire. Finally, a devasted Julia and Willie say their goodbyes to their friend, before burying him secretly in the woods.

episodes.name: DS-537
episodes.overview: Carolyn and Stokes are alarmed when Adam suffers violent choking symptoms. When Julia is summoned to examine Adam, she realises that his survival must mean that Barnabas is still alive... but for how long?

episodes.name: DS-538
episodes.overview: Julia and Stokes race to exhume Barnabas, who is astonished to learn that his ordeal has not returned his curse. Paying a visit to Cassandra, he triumphantly gloats that she no longer has any control over him.

episodes.name: DS-539
episodes.overview: Carolyn gives Adam sanctuary, hiding him in Collinwood's abandoned west wing. To punish Cassandra for the failure of the dream curse, Nicholas reduces her hand to a bare skeletal claw.

episodes.name: DS-540
episodes.overview: Under threat of destruction, Cassandra vies to curry favour with Nicholas. When David plays her his tape of Dr. Lang's experiment notes, she realises how Barnabas escaped her curse.

episodes.name: DS-541
episodes.overview: Cassandra reports her discovery to Nicholas, who is astonished to learn about Adam's creation. When David later plays the recording to an eager Julia, it has changed without explanation.

episodes.name: DS-542
episodes.overview: Adam recites love poetry to an elated Carolyn, signalling a newfound affection in both. After being accused of stealing food by Mrs. Johnson, Harry investigates the west wing and discovers Adam.

episodes.name: DS-543
episodes.overview: Carolyn narrowly saves Harry from Adam and spurns Adam's declaration of love. Nicholas visits the grave of Dr. Lang and summons his spirit to question about the method of Adam's creation.

episodes.name: DS-544
episodes.overview: Stokes attempts to tutor Adam, to distract him from his attraction to Carolyn. Attempting to locate Adam, Nicholas summons the people his body was constructed from, who confirm that Adam is at Collinwood.

episodes.name: DS-545
episodes.overview: Visiting Collinwood, Nicholas finds Adam and makes him an offer. Adam later tells Carolyn of the meeting. Cassandra realises that Adam is Barnabas' lifeline and decides to destroy him.

episodes.name: DS-546
episodes.overview: Nicholas ends Cassandra's plans to murder Adam, but she defies her master and launches a voodoo attack. Enraged, Nicholas strips Cassandra of her powers, leaving her mortal and facing death.

episodes.name: DS-547
episodes.overview: Cassandra attempts to kill Barnabas, but fails. Unprotected by magic, she begins to age rapidly as death approaches. As Barnabas and Julia wait for her to die, she defies expectation by disappearing suddenly.

episodes.name: DS-548
episodes.overview: Having admitted her true identity to Barnabas, Angélique visits him to make a final plea for forgiveness. After he gloatingly refuses, Angélique dies, leaving Barnabas and Julia to celebrate their freedom from her.

episodes.name: DS-549
episodes.overview: With Roger's help, Nicholas moves into a new home by the ocean, concealing Angélique's coffin in the basement. Adam follows his growing infatuation with Carolyn and forces himself upon her.

episodes.name: DS-550
episodes.overview: Carolyn is left shocked by Adam's attack and calls on Stokes to intervene. As Adam struggles to understand his identity, Stokes is forced to reveal the truth about his creation, leaving Adam suicidal.

episodes.name: DS-551
episodes.overview: Harry prevents Adam from harming himself. With an ulterior motive, Nicholas offers Adam a new perspective. Adam confronts Barnabas at the Old House and tells Barnabas that he will create a mate.

episodes.name: DS-552
episodes.overview: Adam warns Barnabas he will pay a dear price for his refusal. Victoria breaks the news of her engagement to Jeff to a heartbroken Barnabas. As Victoria leaves the Old House, Adam abducts her.

episodes.name: DS-553
episodes.overview: Adam imprisons a terrified Victoria at Collinwood. Victoria tries to appeal to Adam's compassion. Aware of Barnabas' affection for her, Adam intends to hold Victoria until his demands are met.

episodes.name: DS-554
episodes.overview: As he searches for Victoria, Barnabas is troubled to hear the barking of dogs. While working for Nicholas, handyman Tom Jennings finds himself in danger after he discovers the coffin of Angélique in the basement.

episodes.name: DS-555
episodes.overview: As the search intensifies, Nicholas vies to convince Jeff that Barnabas is responsible for the kidnapping, while making plans to move Victoria to his house. Meanwhile, Angélique lives after death as a vampire.

episodes.name: DS-556
episodes.overview: Nicholas reveals his true plans, for Adam to be the first of a new race, with him as its leader. Adam confronts Barnabas with proof that he is holding Victoria captive, and demands a mate once again.

episodes.name: DS-557
episodes.overview: Jeff realises the truth about Adam and confronts Barnabas and Julia about the experiment. Despite their denials, he remains unconvinced. Barnabas appeals to Stokes to intervene with Adam to save Victoria.

episodes.name: DS-558
episodes.overview: After speaking with Stokes, Adam struggles with his conscience and asks Nicholas to release Victoria. Nicholas convinces Adam that Stokes cannot be trusted. Barnabas and Julia agree to Adam's demands.

episodes.name: DS-559
episodes.overview: Victoria is released, but with her memory of her ordeal removed. Nicholas pays Maggie a visit, as his affection for her continues to grow. To cement his relationship, Nicholas orders Angélique to attack Joe.

episodes.name: DS-560
episodes.overview: A reluctant Willie is enlisted to assist Barnabas and Julia's experiment. When Joe pays Nicholas a visit, he discovers Angélique, who claims to be a prisoner. Drawing closer, she advances with her fangs bared.

episodes.name: DS-561
episodes.overview: Julia sets up a laboratory in the Old House basement. Barnabas is suspicious of Joe's withdrawn behaviour. Willie goes graverobbing and is caught in the act, as Joe follows Angélique's supernatural summons.

episodes.name: DS-562
episodes.overview: Angélique calls Joe to her, after which Nicholas gives him a job to do. Joe confronts Barnabas over Willie's activities. As Tom begins to recover from his coma, Nicholas fears that his work will be exposed.

episodes.name: DS-563
episodes.overview: Maggie pays the newly awakened Tom a visit in hospital. Joe's erratic behavior causes Maggie concern, which Nicholas is happy to exploit. As Tom sleeps, Angélique enters his room to deliver a fatal attack.

episodes.name: DS-564
episodes.overview: Fearful that Tom will rise as a vampire, Barnabas makes plans to stake him. After a close encounter with Joe, Barnabas and Willie succeed in exhuming Tom's coffin, but are shocked to discover that it is empty.

episodes.name: DS-565
episodes.overview: Jeff suspects Barnabas knows the truth about Victoria's disappearance and discovers Lang's journal while investigating. As Julia works in the Old House laboratory, Tom corners her, baring his fangs.

episodes.name: DS-566
episodes.overview: Julia's attack affects her behavior drastically and she tries to dismiss plans to continue with the experiment. Recognizing her symptoms, Barnabas pulls away her scarf to reveal the tell-tale neck wounds.

episodes.name: DS-567
episodes.overview: Adam demands that his mate will be with him in a month, or everyone at Collinwood will die. Breaking into the Old House, Jeff discovers Julia's handiwork for the experiment... and Barnabas lurking in the shadows.

episodes.name: DS-568
episodes.overview: Jeff confronts Barnabas about the threat Adam poses to Victoria. A worried Roger learns that Elizabeth has escaped from the asylum. Barnabas persuades Julia to act as bait in a plan to deal with Tom.

episodes.name: DS-569
episodes.overview: In a trancelike state, Elizabeth wanders back to Collinwood, where the family tend to her. When Julia is left to watch her, a summons from Tom sends her into the night, followed by a confused Elizabeth.

episodes.name: DS-570
episodes.overview: Elizabeth confides in Barnabas that she fears being buried alive. Barnabas arrives at the crypt and narrowly saves Julia from Tom. With Tom's hideaway discovered, Barnabas returns, intent on defeating him.

episodes.name: DS-571
episodes.overview: As Tom lies prone during the day, Barnabas stakes his enemy. Elizabeth demands that Roger and Barnabas return to the scene, where they discover the coffin has gone. Roger fears for Elizabeth's mental state.

episodes.name: DS-572
episodes.overview: Maggie struggles to break through to Joe, who begs her to guard him. However, when Angélique puts his resolve to the test, he forcefully leaves. While Nicholas is away, Julia and Barnabas search his house.

episodes.name: DS-573
episodes.overview: Barnabas takes Joe back to the cottage, where he begs for Maggie to prevent him from leaving again. Nicholas arranges for Angélique to summon Joe, allowing him to comfort a distressed Maggie.

episodes.name: DS-574
episodes.overview: Maggie and Joe's relationship worsens as he becomes more unhinged. Nicholas discovers from Willie that the experiment used Barnabas as the life force for Adam, unknowingly overheard by Angélique.

episodes.name: DS-575
episodes.overview: Angélique plans on being the life force for the experiment, despite Nicholas' misgivings. Stokes intervenes when Adam and Jeff come to blows. Jeff is bitten by Angélique, as part of her latest scheme.

episodes.name: DS-576
episodes.overview: Angélique tells Jeff her plan to be the life force. A preoccupation with the experiment costs Jeff a new job. Elizabeth is tormented by a dream of her funeral, with her paralyzed in a coffin, unable to call for help.

episodes.name: DS-577
episodes.overview: Convinced that death is near, Elizabeth calls Tony to arrange changes to her will. A jealous Adam is devastated when he spies Carolyn kissing Tony. Enraged, Adam viciously attacks Tony.

episodes.name: DS-578
episodes.overview: Roger expresses concern over Elizabeth's funeral requests, and learns that she plans to exclude the family from her will if they do not comply. After being locked up by Harry, Adam breaks out and takes flight.

episodes.name: DS-579
episodes.overview: Jeff's secret agenda is almost uncovered when Julia catches him looking through her notes. As Victoria's patience with Jeff's erratic behavior wears thin, she breaks off their engagement and gives back the ring

episodes.name: DS-580
episodes.overview: Adam reflects on Carolyn's rejection and has second thoughts about the plan to create a mate. Angélique takes matters into her own hands with the experiment and demands that Jeff begins the process.

episodes.name: DS-581
episodes.overview: Having bitten Jeff again, Angélique gives him 24 hours to prepare the experiment. A gift from Carolyn restores Adam's wounded pride. Jeff reluctantly begins work, with Angélique installed as the life force.

episodes.name: DS-582
episodes.overview: Barnabas decides that Jeff cannot be trusted. Jeff struggles to understand Angélique's true nature. Barnabas decides that Maggie must be the life force and Willie attempts to destroy the body to spare her.

episodes.name: DS-583
episodes.overview: Barnabas stops Willie, while Adam demands results. Victoria and Maggie remain curious about the cause of Jeff and Joe's recent personality changes. To protect her from the experiment, Willie kidnaps Maggie.

episodes.name: DS-584
episodes.overview: Returning to the mausoleum awakens memories of Maggie's kidnap. Now without a life force or an immediate replacement, Barnabas realises that he must kill Adam or risk the destruction of the entire Collins family.

episodes.name: DS-585
episodes.overview: Julia makes Barnabas reconsider his plan. Adam launches an attack on Barnabas and prevents Julia from warning Victoria of the danger she faces. As Barnabas races to save Victoria, Adam begins to choke her.

episodes.name: DS-586
episodes.overview: Nicholas tries to convince Carolyn that Adam had no part in the attack on Victoria. Concerned by the plan to use Maggie as life force in the experiment, Nicholas primes Adam to request Carolyn instead.

episodes.name: DS-587
episodes.overview: Barnabas is unwilling to let Carolyn be used in the experiment. Maggie remains imprisoned by Willie, as more of her memories return. When her escape attempts fail, Nicholas uses his powers to make Willie let her go.

episodes.name: DS-588
episodes.overview: Nicholas uses his supernatural powers of persuasion to convince Carolyn to act as the life force. Willie's plans to release Maggie are complicated when she announces that she knows Barnabas' secret.

episodes.name: DS-589
episodes.overview: Willie is shocked when Maggie reveals that she can finally remember the truth about her kidnapping. Carolyn pretends to leave for a trip, before volunteering herself to provide the life force for Adam's mate.

episodes.name: DS-590
episodes.overview: A terrified Barnabas dispatches Julia to suppress Maggie's newfound memories with hypnosis. However, Adam stops Julia en route, forcing her and Barnabas to return to their work on the experiment.

episodes.name: DS-591
episodes.overview: Barnabas begs Carolyn to reconsider, but her mind is made up. Carolyn refuses a final offer from Adam to leave Collinsport together. When the experiment goes awry, Carolyn's life is left hanging in the balance.

episodes.name: DS-592
episodes.overview: The body remains inanimate as the experiment fails, while Carolyn lies dead. A vengeful Adam vows that all at Collinwood will die. Julia is shocked when she discovers that Carolyn's corpse has disappeared.

episodes.name: DS-593
episodes.overview: Barnabas and Julia are confused as Carolyn’s body is missing and Adam has not yet shown up at Collinwood to kill everyone. Julia tries to hypnotize Maggie to forget what Barnabas did to her the previous year, however she recognizes Julia’s medallion. Julia tells Barnabas that Maggie cannot be hypnotized. Barnabas, feeling defeated, decides to tell the family everything. Barnabas goes to Collinwood and Carolyn opens the door.

episodes.name: DS-594
episodes.overview: Nicholas summons the dark spirit of Danielle Roget to serve as the life force for the new experiment. Adam arrives at the Old House with a stranger, who he announces will be the life force instead.

episodes.name: DS-595
episodes.overview: Adam's new companion, Leona Eltridge, claims to be terminally ill, making her a willing candidate for the experiment. When Julia completes her work, Leona is dead and Eve, the new woman, is born

episodes.name: DS-596
episodes.overview: Eve adjusts to her new life and claims to be reincarnated from an unknown person. Stokes is alarmed to discover that Leona Eldridge is an anagram of Danielle Roget, having heard of her dark reputation.

episodes.name: DS-597
episodes.overview: Stokes is now certain that Eve is composed of pure evil. Supernatural forces guide him, Julia and Barnabas to the cellars, where they discover Leona's body has disappeared, along with Adam and Eve.

episodes.name: DS-598
episodes.overview: Stokes continues to seach for Adam, fearful of Eve's influence. David spies Willie visiting the secret room at the mausoleum and unwittingly stumbles upon the imprisoned Maggie, setting her free.

episodes.name: DS-599
episodes.overview: Desperate to preserve his secret, Barnabas races to find Maggie. Joe is bitten by Angelique, while Maggie watches. When Maggie encounters Barnabas, her memory seems to be blank again, but who is responsible?

episodes.name: DS-600
episodes.overview: Eve tells Nicholas about her hatred of Adam. Stokes holds a seance, as his investigation of Danielle Roget continues. When Adam suffers a supernatural attack, Barnabas suffers because of their link.

episodes.name: DS-601
episodes.overview: Nicholas comes to Adam's aid. Barnabas makes plans to murder Eve, which are reported to Nicholas by an eavesdropping Harry Johnson. Nicholas summons Angelique, determined to end Barnabas' meddling.

episodes.name: DS-602
episodes.overview: Nicholas stops Angelique from feeding on Jeff, disguising the marks of her attack. Fearful of Barnabas' plans, Adam gives Eve sanctuary in Nicholas' cellar. Nicholas turns Angelique onto Barnabas.

episodes.name: DS-603
episodes.overview: Elizabeth continues to suffer portents of death, as voices in her head tell her she will die tonight. When she disappears, a search party finds her in the cemetery. Returned to Collinwood, she appears to be dead.

episodes.name: DS-604
episodes.overview: Elizabeth is declared dead by Julia, but stirs back to life shortly afterwards. Jeff and Victoria renew their relationship. Julia and Barnabas continue to plot Eve's murder, but Julia senses danger ahead

episodes.name: DS-605
episodes.overview: Stokes invites Nicholas out for the evening, so that his home will be unprotected. Barnabas goes to the house to kill Eve. However, she is nowhere to be found, but Angelique is lurking, ready to attack.

episodes.name: DS-606
episodes.overview: Barnabas becomes a vampire's victim at Angelique's hands, returning to Julia with flimsy excuses about failing to kill Eve. Julia worries for her friend. Angelique continues to feed on Barnabas, angering Nicholas.

episodes.name: DS-607
episodes.overview: Angelique's attacks on Barnabas leave Adam weakened. Joe suffers the twin blows of seeing Maggie and Nicholas together, and of being rejected by Angelique. Distraught, he attempts to commit suicide.

episodes.name: DS-608
episodes.overview: Joe is badly injured and Angelique summons Barnabas to take him away. At the Old House, Julia works to save Joe's life. Discovering bite marks on Barnabas' neck, a jealous Joe vows to kill him.

episodes.name: DS-609
episodes.overview: Eve visits Collinwood for the first time, but her temper soon flares, and she shuns Adam to explore for herself. She is soon intrigued to meet Jeff, recognising him as the reincarnation of Peter Bradford.

episodes.name: DS-610
episodes.overview: Eve's revelation about Jeff's identity brings him more trauma, as he struggles with his past. Elizabeth decides Eve is a dark force. Nicholas shows Eve her life in 1796, where Peter shunned her advances.

episodes.name: DS-611
episodes.overview: Eve is determined to be united with Peter. Nicholas makes plans to leave town with Maggie as his bride. When Maggie turns down Nicholas' marriage proposal, he enlists Harry to poison Joe's medicine.

episodes.name: DS-612
episodes.overview: Angelique meets with Barnabas in the woods to feed once again, leaving him unconscious afterwards. When he awakes, he finds himself enlisted to administer the poisoned medicine to a helpless Joe.

episodes.name: DS-613
episodes.overview: Julia intervenes and saves Joe's life, with her suspicions mounting after an analysis of the medicine is conducted. Meanwhile, paranoid and suspecting foul play, Joe takes a curtain cord and attacks Barnabas.

episodes.name: DS-614
episodes.overview: Mrs Johnson stumbles on Joe's attack and saves Barnabas' life. Joe is found unconscious in the mausoleum. When he speaks of his attack and vows to kill Barnabas, his ordeal becomes a police matter.

episodes.name: DS-615
episodes.overview: The sheriff begins to investigate Joe's case, as the poisoned medicine and spate of attacks come to light. Barnabas is summoned by Angelique again, but this time Julia learns of this influence and plots her move.

episodes.name: DS-616
episodes.overview: Barnabas is made a prisoner by Julia and Willie, as they struggle to protect him. Nicholas continues to unsuccessfuly court Maggie's favour. Barnabas uses a secret passage to escape into the night.

episodes.name: DS-617
episodes.overview: Roger witnesses an intimate encounter between Jeff and Eve and warns that he will tell Victoria if it happens again. Later that night, Roger has a nightmare premonition that Victoria will die if she marries.

episodes.name: DS-618
episodes.overview: Roger relays his dream to a distressed Victoria. Angelique abducts Barnabas and plans for them to elope once he is made a vampire again. Barnabas succeeds in summoning Victoria to come to his aid.

episodes.name: DS-619
episodes.overview: Desperate for a hiding place, Victoria secrets Barnabas in the closed wing of Collinwood. Julia investigates Barnabas' disappearance, whilst Nicholas fears that Angelique's disobedience will expose him.

episodes.name: DS-620
episodes.overview: Adam gives Julia clues about Barnabas' plight. Angelique uses Adam to rob Barnabas of his protective crucifix, summoning him to the woods for a final feed. She leaves him dying, soon to rise as a vampire.

episodes.name: DS-621
episodes.overview: The hunt for Barnabas continues. Julia begs Nicholas to stake Angelique, pointing out that Adam will die from Barnabas' injuries. Willie finds Barnabas, saving his life. Nicholas decides Angelique must die.

episodes.name: DS-622
episodes.overview: Nicholas is foiled when he discovers Angelique's coffin is empty. Eve longs to learn about Peter, so Angelique strikes a bargain, agreeing to help her journey into the past in return for protection during daylight.

episodes.name: DS-623
episodes.overview: Eve journeys to the year 1796, where Peter Bradford awaits the gallows, and offers him an escape route. She succeeds in saving the Collins Family History book from destruction, returning it to the present.

episodes.name: DS-624
episodes.overview: As Victoria's wedding approaches, Eve plots to break up the happy couple. Eve gives the book she retrieved to Victoria, making it seem like a gift from Jeff. Meanwhile, Eve pretends to be attracted to Adam.

episodes.name: DS-625
episodes.overview: Victoria prepares to wed Jeff, unaware of Eve's plans. Eve brings Jeff to crisis point when she shows him a letter written by Peter Bradford. Distraught, Jeff digs up Peter's grave, only to discover it is empty.

episodes.name: DS-626
episodes.overview: Victoria suffers troubling dreams about her relationship with Peter in the past. When Adam discovers Eve's lies about her love for him, he kills her in a jealous rage and plants the body in Jeff's wardrobe.

episodes.name: DS-627
episodes.overview: Victoria and Jeff deal with their gruesome discovery. Chris Jennings arrives to investigate the death of his twin brother, Tom. Angelique unites with Adam to break free from Nicholas, but her plans backfire.

episodes.name: DS-628
episodes.overview: Angelique meets with dark leader Diablos to report about Nicholas' misjudgements and his growing love for Maggie. Diablos speaks to Nicholas through Maggie and summons him to explain himself.

episodes.name: DS-629
episodes.overview: Diablos tells Nicholas he can only be with Maggie if she takes part in a black mass. Meanwhile, Nicholas tells a horrified Julia that Eve must be revived, to lead a new race of evil alongside Adam.

episodes.name: DS-630
episodes.overview: An angry Victoria confronts Nicholas about his relationship with Maggie. Furious, Nicholas removes the stake from Tom Jennings' heart, restoring his vampiric existence, and orders him to attack Victoria.

episodes.name: DS-631
episodes.overview: Victoria has a narrow escape from Tom, prompting a vengeful Barnabas to confront Nicholas. Later, Barnabas confronts Tom with a makeshift crucifix and traps him in the sunlight, destroying him forever.

episodes.name: DS-632
episodes.overview: Chris visits Amy, his troubled young sister, and the two bond. Mr Wells, the manager of the Collinsport Inn, falls foul of a vicious animal. Nicholas performs the black mass that will unite him and Maggie.

episodes.name: DS-633/634
episodes.overview: Barnabas is shocked when Nicholas brings Maggie to the laboratory, to serve as the life force to revive Eve. As the experiment fails, destroying Eve, Barnabas is delighted to see Nicholas consumed in flames.

episodes.name: DS-635
episodes.overview: Barnabas returns to the Old House and tells Julia that Nicholas is dead. Julia hugs Barnabas in relief. Meanwhile, Adam, still determined to find a life force for his mate, breaks into Collinwood and knocks Vicki unconscious. Carolyn tries to stop him, but he knocks her unconscious as well. He carries Vickie out of the house and takes her to the Old House. Locking her in the basement, he straps her to the table, connecting her to the skeleton that was Eve. Barnabas and Julia try to break into the basement, but the door is locked. Adam turns on the equipment, and begins draining Vicki's life force from her. Barnabas manages to break into the basement and confronts Adam with a rifle. Adam laughs tauntingly and tells Barnabas that he can't kill him, or else he'll revert back to what he was. Barnabas hesitates, and Adam goes back to controlling the machinery. Barnabas shoots Adam in the back.

episodes.name: DS-636
episodes.overview: A wounded Adam seeks sanctuary with Stokes, who makes plans to send him to a clinic for scars treatment. Jeff realises that he is the reincarnation of Peter Bradford and he and Victoria are reunited.

episodes.name: DS-637
episodes.overview: Jeff is troubled as his wedding approaches. With Elizabeth as a witness, Victoria and Jeff are married and honeymoon at the Inn. However, the night ends in turmoil as Jeff is drawn back into the past.

episodes.name: DS-638
episodes.overview: Chris and Julia find themselves at odds over Amy's care, as she begins life at Collinwood. While walking in the woods at night, Elizabeth finds herself at the mercy of a wild animal.

episodes.name: DS-639
episodes.overview: Amy saves Elizabeth from the creature, which she claims walked like a man. Amy and David explore the closed section of Collinwood, where she talks on an old telephone to the ghost of Quentin Collins.

episodes.name: DS-640
episodes.overview: David and Amy attempt to contact the spirit of Quentin, without success. During a date with Carolyn, Chris is distracted and leaves. He later turns into a werewolf and attacks the barmaid at the Blue Whale.

episodes.name: DS-641
episodes.overview: Amy has a worrying dream about Chris being in danger. Victoria visits Stokes, who tells her that there is no hope of reunion with Peter short of death. Feeling suicidal, Victoria goes the edge of Widows' Hill.

episodes.name: DS-642
episodes.overview: Elizabeth and Stokes save Victoria. The residents hold a seance to contact Peter, but instead a gyspy called Madga delivers a warning via Carolyn. Chris suddenly interrupts the seance, for reasons of his own.

episodes.name: DS-643
episodes.overview: Amy senses that Quentin is angry with her and David and suggests they pay him a visit. David and Amy embark on a frightening tour of the west wing, guided by Quentin's spirit, finding themselves trapped.

episodes.name: DS-644
episodes.overview: As Roger, Elizabeth and Carolyn search for the children, the word 'Jamison' writes itself on a mirror. David and Amy are haunted by Quentin's music and discover a secret walled-off room in the west wing.

episodes.name: DS-645
episodes.overview: The children discover a skeleton in the room and find themselves enlisted to play a sinister game on Quentin's behalf. They are told to fetch a crib from the Old House and bring it to Quentin's room.

episodes.name: DS-646
episodes.overview: The spirits of Quentin Collins and a woman named Beth appear to the children. At Quentin's orders, the children bury the skeleton from the room and David places a tripwire on the stairs, which injures Roger.

episodes.name: DS-647
episodes.overview: Roger recovers from his accident, but Elizabeth decides that outside help is required. Calling upon Professor Stokes, he enlists the services of psychic medium Janet Findley to investigate Collinwood.

episodes.name: DS-648
episodes.overview: Ms Findley grows troubled as her investigation continues. The mark of the pentagram appears on Joe. David and Amy lure Ms Findley into a secret passage, delivering her to Quentin's secret room.

episodes.name: DS-649
episodes.overview: Quentin torments the trapped Ms Findley, as she begs for mercy. Chris worries about Joe and the pentagram. Elizabeth encounters a prone Ms Findley at the top of the stairs, who falls down the steps to her death.

episodes.name: DS-650
episodes.overview: Victoria grieves her loss and rejects Barnabas' marriage proposal. After haunting Collinwood as a phantom light, Jeff returns and together, he and Victoria fade into the past, before Elizabeth and Barnabas' eyes.

episodes.name: DS-651
episodes.overview: Elizabeth continues to worry about her impending death. Joe grows concerned at Chris' apparent neglect of Amy. A tortured Chris begs Julia for sleeping pills and later begins to transform into a werewolf.

episodes.name: DS-652/653
episodes.overview: Elizabeth offers Maggie the job of governess to the children, which she accepts. Amy once again sees the mark of the pentagram on Joe. At the cottage, Chris attacks Joe under the curse of the werewolf.

episodes.name: DS-654
episodes.overview: Joe escapes with minor injuries but, confronting Chris, realizes his cousin's secret existence. Chris convinces Joe to shoot him when he next transforms, but the bullets prove powerless against the beast.

episodes.name: DS-655
episodes.overview: Elizabeth has a dream in which Cassandra warns her that she will be buried alive. Joe goes insane and kidnaps Amy to “protect” her from Chris. Elizabeth appears to die, Julia pronounces her dead, however she is not.

episodes.name: DS-656
episodes.overview: Barnabas plans to carry out Elizabeth’s wishes to be buried in a special casket and mausoleum. Barnabas plans to send David and Amy on a trip to Boston, however Quentin has instructed the children that they are not to leave. Victoria’s clothing is found back in her room after Mrs. Johnson had previously disposed of them.

episodes.name: DS-657
episodes.overview: David and Amy are concerned about leaving Collinwood. Barnabas decides not to take the children to Boston believing that Victoria might return from the past.

episodes.name: DS-658
episodes.overview: Joe is in jail and suffering from delusions of Chris the werewolf and Tom the vampire. Julia makes plans to take Joe to Windcliff for treatment.

episodes.name: DS-659
episodes.overview: Julia convinces Barnabas that they should take the children to Boston after all. David takes a photograph of Barnabas and Carolyn; when David develops the film a picture of Victoria being hung can be seen in the background. Barnabas decides to stay at Collinwood because he is sure Victoria is in trouble and needs his help.

episodes.name: DS-660
episodes.overview: Barnabas decides he has to find a way to travel back to 1796 to save Victoria from the gallows; Julia tries to talk him out of it. Barnabas asks Stokes for help in traveling back in time. David and Amy find the fresh grave of Peter Bradford. Later Barnabas and Julia find the grave of Victoria Winters.

episodes.name: DS-661
episodes.overview: Barnabas tells Julia everything that happened the night Victoria was hanged in 1796: Naomi’s death, Joshua’s decision to destroy Barnabas, the murder of Nathan Forbes, Joshua’s decision to chain up Barnabas instead of destroying him. Barnabas calls out to the spirits of Peter Bradford and Victoria and then returns to the 1796, once again a vampire.

episodes.name: DS-662
episodes.overview: Barnabas plans to change the course of history by saving Victoria. Barnabas gives Nathan an opportunity to save his life if he will do something. Barnabas waits at Collinwood for Nathan.

episodes.name: DS-663
episodes.overview: Barnabas bites Nathan then forces him to write a confession that he lied in his testimony at Victoria’s trial. Forbes confession is only able to release Peter from jail, Victoria will still be hanged. Barnabas attacks a woman (Crystal Cabot) on the docks, she falls into the water and drowns. While in jail Nathan tries to convince Millicent to drive a stake through Barnabas’ heart. Later Barnabas finds Crystal’s body in the study at Collinwood.

episodes.name: DS-664
episodes.overview: Barnabas gets Ben to help him dispose of Crystal’s body, but finds Angelique in her place. Angelique agrees to help save Victoria if he will resume their marriage. Victoria is hung and pronounced dead. Angelique plans to keep Victoria in a state of suspended animation, and never release her.

episodes.name: DS-665
episodes.overview: Angelique tells Barnabas that she will not release Victoria, Barnabas sets her on fire, destroying her and releasing Victoria. Victoria and Peter plan to leave Collinsport together. Barnabas asks Ben to chain him in his coffin so he may return to the present. Natalie and Nathan plan to drive a stake through Barnabas’ heart.

episodes.name: DS-666
episodes.overview:
Ben kills Nathan and Natalie before they can harm Barnabas. In the present Willie and Julia wait for Barnabas to return, however he 

never does. Willie checks the mausoleum but Barnabas is not in the coffin; shortly after Willie leaves the chains re-appear around the coffin and Barnabas is trapped inside. Josette appears to Willie, crying; he is convinced that Barnabas is in the coffin now.

episodes.name: DS-668
episodes.overview: Carolyn asks Chris to move into the cottage on the estate. Mrs. Johnson catches David and Amy dressed in 19th century clothing and acting like Quentin and Beth. David tells Amy that something is going to happen to Mrs. Johnson.

episodes.name: DS-669
episodes.overview: David and Amy play “hide and seek” with Maggie. Mrs. Johnson and Harry clean the cottage for Chris to move in. David and Amy lock Mrs. Johnson in the cottage and Quentin appears to her. Maggie arrives at the cottage and lets Mrs. Johnson out. Mrs. Johnson suspects the children know something about the man she saw in the cottage.

episodes.name: DS-670
episodes.overview: Chris moves into the cottage, however he tells Carolyn that he will be going away for a few days. Amy sees the sign of the pentagram in Carolyn’s face. David and Amy plan to “play the game” with Carolyn. Amy pretends to be ill, and Maggie goes to the cottage to get Chris; David and Amy had expected Carolyn to go. Maggie shows up just as Chris is about to change in the werewolf.

episodes.name: DS-671
episodes.overview: Chris convinces Maggie to go away before changing into the werewolf. Elizabeth continues to lie in her coffin unable to speak while everyone thinks she is dead. Carolyn goes to confront Chris about his lack of concern for Amy, while in the woods Elizabeth tries to warn Carolyn that she is in danger.

episodes.name: DS-672
episodes.overview: The werewolf traps Carolyn in Elizabeth’s mausoleum; Elizabeth is able to push a button in her coffin, which causes bells to ring. Barnabas goes to the mausoleum and saves Carolyn. Julia examines Elizabeth and proclaims that she is still dead. Later Elizabeth shows up at Collinwood and tells everyone how Cassandra put her under a spell. Barnabas shoots the werewolf

episodes.name: DS-673
episodes.overview: The bullets appear to have little effect on the werewolf; Barnabas chases it off with his silver headed cane. Barnabas visits Chris telling him that the “wild animal” attacked Carolyn, Chris says that he was sleeping in the cottage all night. Julia suspects that Chris is hiding something. Beth instructs Amy to burns the shirt that Chris was wearing which now had bullet holes and bloodstains.

episodes.name: DS-674
episodes.overview: Barnabas begins to suspect that Chris is the werewolf. Carolyn shows a friend (Donna Friedlander) around Collinwood. Donna takes a liking to Chris and tries to get a ride from him back to Bangor. Chris turns into the werewolf and kills her.

episodes.name: DS-675
episodes.overview: Carolyn identifies Donna’s body and tells the sheriff that Chris was the last person to see her. The sheriff suspects Chris and takes him in for questioning. Julia and Barnabas remove incriminating evidence from Chris’ cottage. Barnabas tells the sheriff that Chris was will him drinking all night; the sheriff releases him. Barnabas tells Chris that he knows he is the werewolf.

episodes.name: DS-676
episodes.overview: Barnabas locks Chris in the secret room in the Collins mausoleum so he will not be able to hurt anyone when he is the werewolf. Mrs. Johnson is increasingly disturbed by the children’s behavior. Quentin wants David to poison Chris, but he refuses to do it.

episodes.name: DS-677
episodes.overview: Barnabas releases Chris from the mausoleum where he spent the night without incident. David visits and distracts Chris while Quentin poisons his drink. Chris believes that the transformation will not occur this evening, however he starts to suffer pain from the poison. The ghost of Beth leads Julia and Barnabas to the Cottage where they find Chris dying.

episodes.name: DS-678
episodes.overview: In a dream Beth warns Amy that Quentin is trying to kill Chris. Barnabas and Julia suspect that Chris tried to kill himself, however he convinces them otherwise. After talking with David, Amy decides to tell Elizabeth about Quentin and “the game.”

episodes.name: DS-679
episodes.overview: David hurts Amy while trying to stop her from telling Elizabeth about Quentin. Amy tries to tell Elizabeth and then is stopped when she sees Quentin. Elizabeth and Maggie become concerned with David’s recent behavior. Maggie follows David into the West wing of Collinwood.

episodes.name: DS-680
episodes.overview: David asks Quentin what he should do. Maggie questions David about his recent behavior and why he was in the West wing. Maggie punishes David and he threatens to get even with her. Maggie later sees Quentin in the West wing.

episodes.name: DS-681
episodes.overview: Maggie tells Elizabeth about seeing the strange man in the West wing. Carolyn and Chris search the West wing and do not find anything. David takes Elizabeth and Maggie to the West wing and where they find a dummy which “must” have been what Maggie saw.

episodes.name: DS-682
episodes.overview: Maggie dreams that Quentin chokes her to death. Maggie tells everything that has happened to Barnabas who agrees to help her. Stokes suggests holding a seance to contact Janet Findley who died investigating the house. During the seance Mrs. Findley speaks through Mrs. Johnson who says “he killed me.”

episodes.name: DS-683
episodes.overview: Barnabas and Julia try to find out more about the spirits in the house. Julia hypnotizes Chris in an attempt to find out about the woman (Beth) who helped save his life. Beth leads Chris to a spot on the ground; later Barnabas and Chris dig there and find a child’s coffin.

episodes.name: DS-684
episodes.overview: In the coffin Barnabas and Chris find a pentagram on the child’s body. Later Quentin tells David to steal the pentagram from Barnabas. Barnabas visits Ezra Braithwaite, a silversmith, to find out more about the pentagram. Mr. Braithwaite finds information and plans to meet Barnabas at Collinwood.

episodes.name: DS-685
episodes.overview: Quentin continues to possess David, however disappears when Amy shows up. David and Amy discuss what it is that Quentin has been making them do. Ezra shows up at Collinwood, he has found out that the pentagram was ordered by Beth Chavez and charged to Quentin Collins. However before he can tell anyone Quentin appears to him, scaring him to death.

episodes.name: DS-686
episodes.overview: Barnabas and Julia contemplate what Ezra was going to tell them. David takes the ledger which Ezra brought with him to Collinwood; Quentin makes David rip out a page which contains crucial information. Roger returns to Collinwood and is upset that his son has been accused of some of the strange things occurring recently. The ledge is later found in the drawing room. Julia finds a picture of Beth in an old family album.

episodes.name: DS-687
episodes.overview:
Chris feels like he is going to transform into the werewolf and has Barnabas lock him in the mausoleum. A man named Ned Stuart shows up at Collinwood looking for Chris. Ned Stuart finds 

Barnabas and Julia at Chris’ cottage, he tells them that Chris was engaged to his sister and implies that she is dead.

episodes.name: DS-688
episodes.overview: David writes a story about a man who turned into an animal and was hidden in a room, later someone lets the animal out of the room and a hunter kills it. David runs out of the house and Maggie searches for him. Julia and Barnabas find David’s story and speculate if David knows about Chris (who is locked in the mausoleum. David goes to the mausoleum and starts to open the secret panel.

episodes.name: DS-689
episodes.overview: Barnabas stops David from opening the secret panel in the mausoleum and brings him back to Collinwood. In the morning Barnabas lets Chris out of the mausoleum and tells him that Ned Stuart is looking for him. Chris explains that he was engaged to Ned’s sister and she was the first person to see his transformation into the werewolf. David tells Quentin that he does not want to “play the game” anymore, Quentin touches is arm and makes it feel like it is on fire. Maggie hears David screaming and the sound of a man’s laughter.

episodes.name: DS-690
episodes.overview: Maggie finds David half unconscious with a burn on his arm asking Quentin not to hurt him; when David revives he denies everything and runs out of the house. Ned confronts Chris, telling him his sister is still alive and he wants Chris to see her. Quentin catches David and Amy in the woods, he wants them to drive everyone out of Collinwood. Maggie searches the house for David and Amy and hears the sound their laughter along with Quentin’s.

episodes.name: DS-691
episodes.overview: Quentin tries to strangle Maggie, Elizabeth and Julia walk in and he disappears. Maggie tells Elizabeth that David and Amy are possessed; later they find the children begging Quentin to leave them alone. Elizabeth and Mrs. Johnson find David and Amy passed out and they hear the sound of Quentin’s music and laughter throughout the house.

episodes.name: DS-692
episodes.overview:
Julia and Elizabeth are convinced that the children must be 

possessed; Professor Stokes agrees to help. Ned threatens Chris that he better see his sister (Sabrina). A disembodied hand tries to stab Elizabeth with a letter opener; Stokes plans to perform an exorcism on Collinwood. Chris and Julia visit Sabrina Stuart and find that she has been in a state of shock for the last two years (the last time she saw Chris). When Sabrina sees Chris, she climbs out of her wheel chair and falls to the floor, reaching out to him.

episodes.name: DS-693
episodes.overview: Chris plans to leave Collinsport, Julia tries to convince him to stay. During the exorcism David passes out, and the exorcism fails. Stokes sees Quentin in a mirror and the room starts to burn.

episodes.name: DS-694
episodes.overview: The ghost of Quentin chases everyone out of Collinwood and into the Old House. Disobeying Maggie’s orders, David and Amy sneak back to Collinwood… but for what purpose?

episodes.name: DS-695
episodes.overview: Chris and Maggie manage to point out the man they have both seen, Quentin, in a family history book to Barnabas. David and Amy sneak back into Collinwood to get the old telephone, however they cannot find it. Maggie catches them and tells them to never go back to the house. Later David and Amy find the telephone in his room. Maggie finds the children missing.

episodes.name: DS-696
episodes.overview: Barnabas and Willie search for David and Amy at Collinwood. Quentin has Amy lead Maggie to Collinwood. Barnabas later finds Maggie in 19th century dress and she appears not know her own name.

episodes.name: DS-697
episodes.overview: Maggie comes around and can only remember seeing Quentin then she was dressed in 19th century clothing. Roger is determined to find David, Quentin leaves a note saying “David is mine.” Ned calls Chris and finds that Sabrina can say his name. Barnabas takes Chris to the mausoleum as he starts to feel the transformation starting. Barnabas visits Sabrina and when she sees his wolf’s head cane she becomes very upset.

episodes.name: DS-698
episodes.overview: Sabrina remembers how she planned a surprise party for Chris two years earlier when he made the transformation in front of her (however she does not tell anyone). After examining Sabrina, Julia is convinced she knows what Chris is and could tell someone, but is keeping quiet. Barnabas and Julia go to the mausoleum to release Chris, however he is still a werewolf despite the absences of a full moon.

episodes.name: DS-699
episodes.overview: Julia thinks there must be some connection between Quentin and Chris. Maggie has a nightmare about Quentin which she later tells Julia and remembers a room at Collinwood that they had not searched. Amy warns Quentin that Maggie knows about the hidden room and they are coming to find David. Maggie and Barnabas find the hidden room.

episodes.name: DS-700
episodes.overview: While searching the hidden room Stokes finds I Ching wands and is convinced they may be the key understanding Quentin. Amy tells Maggie that if they don’t find David soon he will die. Maggie goes to Collinwood and finds David, when she does he falls unconscious; later Julia tells everyone that David is in a coma and will die soon. Against Stokes’ advice Barnabas decides to use the I Ching wands contact Quentin and save David. Barnabas enters a trance and makes a mental journey through a door where he sees a chained coffin.

episodes.name: DS-701
episodes.overview: Barnabas finds himself locked in his coffin. In 1897 gypsies (Sandor and Magda) live in the Old House. Quentin returns to Collinwood after some time away. Edith Collins, head of the family is expected to die soon, and is expected to tell the family secret to the next in line, Edward Collins. Magda sees the mausoleum in her crystal ball and sends Sandor to find jewels; however he finds and releases Barnabas.

episodes.name: DS-702
episodes.overview: Barnabas commands Sandor to help him. Judith tries to bribe Quentin to get him to leave Collinwood, however he plans to stay. Barnabas meets Magda, Sandor’s wife, she discovers he is a vampire.

episodes.name: DS-703
episodes.overview: Barnabas tells Magda that he will give her some of the family jewels in return for protection during the day. Magda warns Judith and Quentin of a stranger that would bring them trouble. Barnabas shows up at Collinwood and introduces himself as a cousin from England. Suspicious of Barnabas’ motives, Quentin threatens to kill him unless he gets some answers.

episodes.name: DS-704
episodes.overview: Barnabas asks for permission to live in the Old House. Barnabas finds that Beth is hiding something when she denies the existence of a third child at Collinwood. Barnabas attacks a woman in the village (Sophie Baker). Quentin threatens Edith to make her tell him the family secret.

episodes.name: DS-705
episodes.overview: Judith stops Quentin from harassing Edith. Edward Collins returns to Collinsport with a new governess, Rachel Drummond, for the children. Barnabas meets with Edith Collins; she is shocked and declares that he is the secret. Edward tries to get Edith to tell him the secret.

episodes.name: DS-706
episodes.overview: Edith is unable to tell Edward the secret. Barnabas meets Carl Collins, who is a practical joker. Edith dies, and Edward plans to find out the secret, no matter what.

episodes.name: DS-707
episodes.overview: Edward questions the other family members, suspecting that one of them must know the secret. Quentin tells Rachel that no one goes in the tower room; later she sees a light coming from it. Judith and Edward discuss a problem in the tower room. Later Edward proves there is not light in the tower room to Rachel.

episodes.name: DS-708
episodes.overview: Edward questions Barnabas about the secret, he denies having learned it from Edith. Quentin plans to make sure that he gets something in Edith’s will even if he has to have it changed. Quentin finds out from Magda that the will is hidden in Edith’s coffin. Quentin sends Jamison to steal Edith’s will. Barnabas tells Quentin he knows he has the will.

episodes.name: DS-709
episodes.overview: Barnabas encourages Quentin to return the will. Barnabas is surprised that Rachel resembles Josette Collins. Judith is convinced Edith’s spirit is trying to find the will. Quentin finds his room mysteriously ransacked then hears the sound of a beating heart.

episodes.name: DS-710
episodes.overview: Quentin is tormented by the ghost of Edith; she warns him to return the will. Evan and Quentin plan to summon a spirit to help keep Barnabas from interfering with their plans. Evan gets Sandor to forge a new will. Quentin and Evan use Jamison during a ceremony; a skull appears in the flames.

episodes.name: DS-711
episodes.overview: Angelique appears following the ceremony; she agrees to help stop Barnabas. Barnabas gives Rachel Josette’s music box. Angelique causes Rachel to choke.

episodes.name: DS-712
episodes.overview: Dirk walks in on Angelique’s while practicing witchcraft, she is distracted and Rachel recovers. Angelique puts a spell on Rachel and tells her she is going to be a pawn in her game, later Barnabas finds Rachel lying in his coffin.

episodes.name: DS-713
episodes.overview: Barnabas sends Magda to Collinwood to help Judith find the will.  Beth warns Rachel not to ask questions about Edward’s wife.  Barnabas gives Rachel a medallion to protect her against Angelique.  Judith finds the will and learns that she will be in control of Collinwood. Beth brings a doll to the tower room to someone named Jenny.

episodes.name: DS-714
episodes.overview: Judith gloats to Carl, Edward, and Quentin as she reads the will that leaves all the money to her. Rachel sees Beth leaving the tower room.

episodes.name: DS-715
episodes.overview: Rachel is unable to get into the tower room, she visits Magda who tells her about a key that can open the door. Someone escapes from the tower room and sets Edward’s room on !re. Edward and Beth take the person back to the tower. Rachel confronts Beth about the person in the tower room, she denies that anyone is there. After encouragement from Magda and with key in hand, Rachel unlocks the door to the tower room.

episodes.name: DS-716
episodes.overview: Rachel is knocked unconscious by Jenny then locks her in the tower room. Dirk finds Nora outside Collinwood, who later claims she is waiting for her mother to return. Jenny starts wandering around the house. Dirk rescues Rachel from the tower room. Rachel tells Judith what has happened, denying that anyone was in the tower room. Judith finds Jenny who now has a sharp pair of scissors.

episodes.name: DS-717
episodes.overview: Beth saves Judith from Jenny who is apparently insane. Rachel tells Barnabas all that has happened to her, he goes to the tower room to investigate. Barnabas searches the tower room and finds nothing; later the door opens while he searches.

episodes.name: DS-718
episodes.overview: Angelique appears to Barnabas and wants him to be her loyal husband again; she warns him that someone will try to destroy him in his coffin. Quentin sends David to steal Barnabas’ cane, which he later uses to practice voodoo. Barnabas starts to feel pain; Magda realizes what Quentin is doing and stops him. Magda is frightened and claims that Quentin has the mark of death and will die soon.

episodes.name: DS-719
episodes.overview: Magda tells Quentin that a woman is going to kill him with a knife. Judith has moved Jenny to the basement. Jenny becomes extremely disturbed when she hears Quentin’s music playing; Judith makes him turn it off. Judith pays Dirk to help keep Jenny under control. Quentin suspects that Judith will try to kill him, he confronts her. Jenny escapes and searches for Quentin with a knife in hand.

episodes.name: DS-720
episodes.overview: Quentin warns Barnabas to not get any ideas about killing him; Barnabas warns Quentin not to trust Angelique. Quentin is surprised to see Jenny, his wife. Dirk finds Quentin stabbed to death; later Barnabas finds Dirk standing over Quentin’s body.

episodes.name: DS-721
episodes.overview: Barnabas finds out from Dirk that Jenny is Quentin’s wife and that she has been locked in the tower room. Jenny tells Beth that she killed Quentin. Barnabas asks Angelique to save Quentin as he was not supposed to die this way. Angelique plans to raise Quentin, but will use him to make Barnabas suffer.

episodes.name: DS-722
episodes.overview: Jamison is upset after finding out about Quentin’s death; he later claims that Quentin is not dead. Carl finds that Quentin’s spirit has taken possession of Jamison. Rachel awakes after a strange dream only to find Quentin (a Zombie) sitting in a rocking chair in her room.

episodes.name: DS-723
episodes.overview: Quentin continues to wander around the house as a Zombie. Barnabas burns some special incense, which leads Quentin back to is coffin. Quentin is buried and cement is poured over his coffin to keep him from rising again. Rachel tells Barnabas that she is going to leave Collinwood. Later Quentin returns to Collinwood and kidnaps Rachel.

episodes.name: DS-724
episodes.overview: Quentin puts Rachel in his coffin. Sandor finds Rachel and saves her, however he is attacked by Quentin. When Barnabas rises at dusk he finds Quentin siting in a chair near his coffin. Barnabas performs a ritual to return Quentin’s spirit to his body, however it fails.

episodes.name: DS-725
episodes.overview: At Edward’s request Reverend Gregory Trask shows up to take Nora and Jamison to his boarding school, Worthington Hall. Trask finds that Jamison is possessed, and performs a ceremony on Jamison and Quentin’s body.

episodes.name: DS-726
episodes.overview: After Trask finishes his ceremony, Quentin and Jamison return to normal. Trask tries to intimidate Jamison into agreeing to go to Worthington Hall. Quentin threatens Judith to let him know where Jenny is at, as he plans to kill her. Jamison runs away from Collinwood.

episodes.name: DS-727
episodes.overview: Charity Trask (Gregory Trask’s daughter) shows up at Collinwood, Rachel is very upset by her presence. Rachel tells Barnabas that she used to live and work at Worthington Hall and was intimidated and blackmailed into staying there. Later Trask accuses Rachel of stealing and warns her to comeback with him. Barnabas bites Charity Trask.

episodes.name: DS-728
episodes.overview: Quentin asks Edward where Jenny is, however he refuses to tell. Quentin discusses Laura Collins (Edward’s wife) who apparently left Collinsport with him a year earlier. Nora draws a picture in Egyptian hieroglyphics that say her mother is coming home; later she sees her mother in the flames of the fireplace.

episodes.name: DS-729
episodes.overview: Nora sees a fire in the hallway, however it is gone when she returns with her father and Beth. Quentin finds that Beth is taking a large sum of money into Collinsport. Nora dreams that her mother comes back to Collinwood, but her father sends her away. Nora leaves the house to find her mother.

episodes.name: DS-730
episodes.overview: Laura promises Nora that they will be together. Nora tells Jamison that their mother has returned. Laura returns asking for Edward to take her back, he tries to pay her to leave. Quentin claims to have seen Laura die.

episodes.name: DS-731
episodes.overview: Quentin says he saw Laura burn to death in Alexandria. After Laura threatens to cause a scandal Edward agrees to allow Laura to move into Collinwood. Edward arranges to have the children sent to Worthington Hall. Timothy Shaw comes to Collinwood to pickup the children, he tells Rachel that he had been accused of murdering Trask’s brother-in-law and had to go back to work at the school. Quentin tries to kill Laura.

episodes.name: DS-732
episodes.overview: Quentin starts to feels burning pain through out his body (stopping him from strangling Laura). Laura recounts how Quentin betrayed her in Alexandria and was burned. Angelique agrees to save Quentin if Barnabas will resume their marriage. Barnabas introduces Angelique as his fiancé, which surprises and upsets Rachel. Angelique tells Quentin that a special urn holds the key to destroying Laura.

episodes.name: DS-733
episodes.overview: Laura catches Quentin searching her room, later he gets Magda to search for the urn. Minerva Trask shows up to take Rachel back to Worthington Hall; she accuses her of accessory to the murder of her brother. Minerva threatens to go to the police if Rachel does not go back with her. Rachel is further upset when she finds that Tim Shaw is planning to marry Charity Trask. Magda helps Rachel by hiding her in the Collins mausoleum.

episodes.name: DS-734
episodes.overview: Trask sends Tim to help find Rachel and bring her back to Worthington Hall. Trask punishes Jamison for eavesdropping by locking him in a closet. Jamison finds a key in the closet and leaves only to instantly be caught by Trask who threatens a stronger punishment. Tim brings money for Rachel to escape, however Trask has followed him.

episodes.name: DS-735
episodes.overview: Trask gives Rachel the choice: go back to Worthington Hall or face a murder charge. Laura communicates with Nora through the flames in the fireplace. Laura shows up at Worthington Hall to get Nora and Jamison; Trask refuses to let the children go with her. Shortly after Laura leaves the school catches on fire.

episodes.name: DS-736
episodes.overview: Quentin attempts to destroy Laura by pouring sand into an urn containing her supernatural power.

episodes.name: DS-737
episodes.overview: In an attempt to save herself from destruction, Laura prays to Ra to take possession of Dirk.

episodes.name: DS-738
episodes.overview: Laura tells Jamison that Quentin is trying to kill her. Barnabas is shocked at the sight of Laura.

episodes.name: DS-739
episodes.overview: Barnabas and Charity find a portrait of Jeremiah Collins' first wife, who looks exactly like Laura Collins.

episodes.name: DS-740
episodes.overview: Barnabas sends Sandor to find Laura's grave. Edward tells Barnabas what he knows of Laura's history.

episodes.name: DS-741
episodes.overview: Laura confesses that she has returned to Collinwood to take custody of her children Jamison and Nora.

episodes.name: DS-742
episodes.overview: Barnabas uses an incantation from the Egyptian Book of the Dead to conjure up the spirit of Laura.

episodes.name: DS-743
episodes.overview: Quentin and Barnabas decide to try to destroy Laura. Jenny is ordered by Laura to kill Quentin.

episodes.name: DS-744
episodes.overview: Jenny meets Barnabas at the Old House and Quentin takes a pistol to search for her.

episodes.name: DS-745
episodes.overview: Jenny's sister Magda is shocked to discover that Jenny has been locked away at Collinwood.

episodes.name: DS-746
episodes.overview: Magda threatens to curse Quentin. Jenny tells Judith that she saw Barnabas in a coffin.

episodes.name: DS-747
episodes.overview: Jenny prepares to kill Quentin and Beth after overhearing them declare their love for each other.

episodes.name: DS-748
episodes.overview: After Quentin accidentally kills Jenny, Magda informs him that he will be cursed for the rest of his life.

episodes.name: DS-749
episodes.overview: Magda describes the history of the curse to Quentin and tells him that it will begin that night.

episodes.name: DS-750
episodes.overview: At sunset, Magda recites an incantation and Quentin is struck by pain as the full Moon rises.

episodes.name: DS-751
episodes.overview: Dorcas Trilling, a teacher at Trask's school, Worthington Hall, is brutally murdered.

episodes.name: DS-752
episodes.overview: Evan Hanley believes the pentagram may Quentin keep quiet and safe from the curse.

episodes.name: DS-753
episodes.overview: Beth steps into the pentagram to protect her from the werewolf. Jamison escapes from school.

episodes.name: DS-754
episodes.overview: Jamison visits Laura, who plans to leave town. She vows revenge after Barnabas takes Jamison from her.

episodes.name: DS-755
episodes.overview: In the grave of Ben Stokes, Dirk finds the diary which Laura believes contains the secret of Barnabas.

episodes.name: DS-756
episodes.overview: After dark locates Barnabas' coffin and Laura realizes he is a vampire and prepares to destroy him.

episodes.name: DS-757
episodes.overview: Angelique attempts to thwart Laura's. A ceremony is held to take laura's life force from her.

episodes.name: DS-758
episodes.overview: Laura calls upon the sun god Ra to help her eliminate Angelique with fire.

episodes.name: DS-759
episodes.overview: Laura gives Dirk a letter to Judith revealing the truth about Barnabas, who later attacks Dirk.

episodes.name: DS-760
episodes.overview: From within a circle of flames, Laura summons her children to join her.

episodes.name: DS-761
episodes.overview: After Quentin pleads to him to help end the curse, Evan conducts a ceremony to raise the devil.

episodes.name: DS-762
episodes.overview: Quentin and Evan grow suspicious of Trask's involvement with Judith and other women.

episodes.name: DS-763
episodes.overview: Beth reveals to Magda that Jenny had twins. Evan puts the spell on Tim to poison a drink.

episodes.name: DS-764
episodes.overview: Barnabas' suspects the Beth has ordered a pentagram to protect Jenny's infant twins.

episodes.name: DS-765
episodes.overview: Beth tells Barnabas about Quentin's curse. Magda shoots the werewolf with silver bullets.

episodes.name: DS-766
episodes.overview: Magda tells Barnabas of an old woman whose daughter may be able to lift the curse from Quentin.

episodes.name: DS-767
episodes.overview: A puzzled Jamison tells Barnabas of his dream about Quentin and David Collins.

episodes.name: DS-768
episodes.overview: Barnabas orders Beth to guard him during the day when he lies vulnerable in his coffin.

episodes.name: DS-769
episodes.overview: Dirk reveals Barnabas' secret to Jamison. After Jamison discovers his coffin, Barnabas attacks Dirk.

episodes.name: DS-770
episodes.overview: Edward investigates Jamison's story about a coffin in the basement of the old house.

episodes.name: DS-771
episodes.overview: Pansy Faye, a mentalist friend of Carl's, attempts to locate the missing Dirk.

episodes.name: DS-772
episodes.overview: Minerva tells Charity she should marry Carl. At Evan's prompting, Tim poisons Minerva.

episodes.name: DS-773
episodes.overview: Rachel suggests a hiding place for 2:00 AM, where he sees a mysterious coffin.

episodes.name: DS-774
episodes.overview: Judith offers her condolences to Trask. Dirk attacks Tim, Judith and Rachel.

episodes.name: DS-775
episodes.overview: Turk tells Barnabas he must bring Laura back to life. Dirk forces Judith to shoot Rachel.

episodes.name: DS-776
episodes.overview: Edward follows Judith to the abandoned cellar and discovers that Dirk's coffin is hidden there.

episodes.name: DS-777
episodes.overview: Gregory Trask is forced to absolve Tim of guilt for Minerva's murder. Carl hears Pansy's voice in the graveyard.

episodes.name: DS-778
episodes.overview: Magda returns with a mysterious box containing the hand of Count Petofi, which she says has magical powers.

episodes.name: DS-779
